Updates the portal user invitation settings.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"allowInvitingMembers":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to allow inviting new DocSpace members through the Contacts section.","example":true},"allowInvitingGuests":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to allow all DocSpace members to invite external guests to the rooms.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for updating the user invitation settings.","title":"TenantUserInvitationSettingsRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
